title: Windows 10 6in1 10240 x64 en-US Aug2015
description:
*NOTE: UPGRADE FROM PREVIOUS WINDOWS VERSION IS DISABLED*
-Use a different Win10 iso for upgrades.

murphy78 presents Windows 10 6in1 x64 10240 en-US

No Windows 10 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Unattended Settings were added to the installation.
No Registry Settings were modified.

64-bit Sources:
en_windows_10_enterprise_2015_ltsb_x64_dvd_6848446.iso
Win10_SingleLang_English_x64.iso

Installation Indexes:
Windows 10 Home Single Language
Windows 10 Home
Windows 10 Pro
Windows 10 Education
Windows 10 Enterprise
Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB

Release File: Win10_10240_x64_Aug2015_6in1_en-US_murphy78.iso
Size: 4.33 GB
SHA-1: F0AE0F558FD6CE4D85134F3273B6B73637378320

Language: en-US (English - United States)

Tools used:
dism for Windows Updates integration and mounted file copy
oscdimg for ISO mastering
Added Info folder to Setup dir to annoy credit thieves.

DISM /add-package and /resetbase (Indexes, boot.wim and winre.wim):
KB3081440, KB3081436

DISM /add-package and /resetbase (Additional - Indexes only):
KB3074678, KB3074686, KB3087916

Features:
-Some useful scripts added to torrent folder (not iso).

Instructions:
-Use a USB program such as RUFUS to put this on a USB
Flash drive for boot installs.
-Alternatively, if you still use physical media, you can
burn the iso to a dvdr or greater.
-Only the Enterprise versions have the gVLK (KMS Key)
pre-installed. For other versions, if you want to activate,
and do not have a key, you will need to install the gVLK.
-I recommend inserting the gVLK during boot setup if you
plan to activate via KMS. It will change the channel to
Volume. It's not required, but it will give you a bogus
Retail channel if you don't.
-THERE IS A SKIP BUTTON ON THE BOOT SETUP FOR KEY ENTRY. DO
NOT COMPLAIN ABOUT ENTERING A KEY. PRESS SKIP!

Notes:
-Upgrade files have been removed in this version of Win10.
-Upgrades fail on previous Windows versions if you don't
use a very specific install format.
-As this is a 6in1, a small single-index esd file or wim
file is not going to happen.

Credits:
CODYQX4 - Microsoft Toolkit KMS Activator
murphy78 - Integration, ISO design and testing

Enjoy,
murphy78 :)
